CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 22, reads: "Refreshment - A birdseye view shows how David Watson, Pepsi-Cola's national representative from New York, and his booth assistant Miss Dorthy Wheeler, were kept busy pouring ice-cold refreshment for thirsty homemakers."
TitMainTitle: Crowd of men and women gathered in front of Pepsi-Cola booth with representatives, David Watson and Dorothy Wheeler, handing out samples, gathered in the Ammon Recreation Center in the Hill District for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
